channel.title: 508 Run Error
channel.description:
Hey Mopar
Im having a bit of a problem running a 508. Yesterday i ran my 508 perfectly, everything worked. Then i get this message:-
java.net.BindException: Address Already In Use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.Bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.Bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java.141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.server.main(server.java:60) Press Any Key To Continue ....
I Need some help, as im trying to move on from my 317 to a 508, im still learning about 508's so this should be a good teaching point if anyone can help.
Regards

item.title: 508 Run Error
item.dc:creator: @G_D_s G D s
item.description:
@G_D_s wrote:

The thing is,
ive already closed any running servers etc,
same message

Im really confused andim trying to get 508 finished by next week :S

Thanks for trying to help

EDIT:
You were right, i restarted my computer and it was all fine.
Thanks a bunch

EDIT2:
Also Found out it might be because my port 43594 isnt working
Problem there idk…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

This means your port is already in use [sub]I think[/sub]

Read full topic

Hey Mopar

Im having a bit of a problem running a 508.
Yesterday i ran my 508 perfectly, everything worked.
Then i get this message:-
